en: Allah is the Light of the heavens and the earth.
The example of His light is like a niche within which is a lamp;
the glass as if it were a pearly [white] star
lit from [the oil of] a blessed tree,
from [the oil of] a blessed olive tree,
neither of the east nor of the west,

ar: يَكَادُ زَيْتُهَا يُضِىءُ وَلَوْ لَمْ تَمْسَسْهُ نَارٌ
en: whose oil would almost glow even if untouched by fire.
Allah guides to His light whom He wills.
And Allah presents examples for the people,
and Allah is Knowing of all things.
